Package projeto

Class Product

java.lang.Object
projeto.Product
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cleaning, Food, Furniture
public abstract class Product extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract superclass that contains a product.
See Also:
Serialized Form

      private String name
      Product name.

    • identifier

      private int identifier
      Product identifier. Between 1 and 10 -> food; Between 11 and 20 -> cleaning; Between 21 and 30 -> furniture;

      private int checkIdentifier​(int lim1, int lim2)

      lim2 - superior limit.
      Returns:
      the identifier.
